resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

ianmcook commented on pull request #12439:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12439#issuecomment-1045503616


   I believe we've had some trouble keeping the R package small enough to be accepted by CRAN without NOTEs. This PR adds about 100 KB of PNG files which might worsen this. Is it possible to use SVGs? 


-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

djnavarro commented on pull request #12439:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12439#issuecomment-1046354765


   As far as I am aware, twitter doesn't accept SVG files as social media previews. What I've done instead is remove the hex sticker entirely (that isn't really needed to make the meta tags work it's just there to make the README a little prettier), and added the logo file to .Rbuildignore. I think that should ensure that the PNG logo will be included in the pkgdown site (and hence appear on twitter) but not the CRAN submission? 


-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

nealrichardson commented on a change in pull request #12439:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12439#discussion_r812382082



##########
File path: r/_pkgdown.yml
##########
@@ -23,6 +23,14 @@ template:
   params:
     bootswatch: cosmo
     ganalytics: UA-107500873-1
+  opengraph:
+    image:
+      src: man/figures/card.png

Review comment:
       I forget, does this work? If so, you don't need to put a copy here at all.
   
   ```suggestion
         src: https://arrow.apache.org/img/arrow-logo_horizontal_black-txt_white-bg.png
   ```




-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

djnavarro commented on a change in pull request #12439:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12439#discussion_r813422165



##########
File path: r/_pkgdown.yml
##########
@@ -23,6 +23,14 @@ template:
   params:
     bootswatch: cosmo
     ganalytics: UA-107500873-1
+  opengraph:
+    image:
+      src: man/figures/card.png

Review comment:
       🤦🏻‍♀️  why didn't I think of that? Yes, that's much easier! 😁 




--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: The pkgdown site currently doesn't use the Arrow logo and doesn't have nice social media preview images
fields.summary: [R] Add logo and meta tags to pkgdown site
